actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require that the Secretary of Transportation shall study the future rail freight service needs of the Northeast corridor.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act to direct the Secretary of Transportation to prepare a comprehensive report on the future rail freight service needs of the Northeast corridor.

titles.title: A bill to require that the Secretary of Transportation shall study the future rail freight service needs of the Northeast corridor.
